cloud.jgo.net.tcp.http

Class HTTPRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • cloud.jgo.net.tcp.http.HTTPRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HTTPMessage, java.lang.Iterable<Header>

    public class HTTPRequest
extends java.lang.Object
implements HTTPMessage
    Author:
    Martire91
    This class represents an http request, and is an implementation of HTTPMessage
